meanings.sent1: The figeaters in the orchard enjoyed the ripe figs.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a figeater and loves snacking on fresh figs.
meanings.sent3: The figeaters at the picnic quickly finished all the figs!
meanings.sent4: She was a notorious figeater, always sneaking figs from the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The little girl was known as the figeater because she adored figs.

meanings.definition: A type of beetle that feeds on figs.
meanings.sent1: The figeaters infested the fig tree, causing damage to the fruit.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use traps to catch figeaters and protect their fig crops.
meanings.sent3: The figeaters had a feast on the fig tree, leaving it bare!
meanings.sent4: The figeaters buzzed around the fig tree like tiny helicopters.
meanings.sent5: The figeaters were a nuisance to the fig farmers, eating all their harvest.
